name: LiveChat
description: Integrate with LiveChat to list, send, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Chats
tools.description: List active and recent chats from LiveChat. Returns chat summaries with visitor names and last messages.

tools.name: Send Event
tools.description: Send a message event to an active LiveChat conversation. The agent must be assigned to the chat.

tools.name: List Agents
tools.description: List agents in the LiveChat account. Returns agent names, emails, and current availability status.

tools.name: Get Chat
tools.description: Get full details of a specific LiveChat conversation including all messages and participants.
